name: Crimson Shard
effect: Grants +2.5 damage and splits tears into three directions
details: A powerful crystalline fragment that amplifies your attack strength. The triple tear pattern makes it excellent for crowd control, though it requires careful positioning to maximize damage output. Particularly effective in narrow corridors.

name: Ethereal Cloak
effect: Grants flight and spectral tears
details: This mysterious cloak allows you to float above obstacles and shoot through walls. Essential for accessing secret areas and avoiding ground-based hazards. The spectral property makes your tears ignore rocks and obstacles.

name: Tome of Shadows
effect: Reveals the entire floor map and marks special rooms
details: An ancient book filled with forbidden knowledge. Using it instantly reveals all rooms on the current floor, including secret rooms, treasure rooms, and the boss location. Has a 4-room recharge.

name: Lucky Coin
effect: 33% chance to drop an extra coin when picking up coins
details: A shiny golden coin that brings fortune to its bearer. The extra coin chance can significantly boost your economy throughout a run, especially in shops and with coin-generating items.

name: Berserker Rage
effect: Grants +1.5 damage and +0.3 speed at half a red heart or less
details: Harness the power of desperation. When your health is critically low, you become faster and deal significantly more damage. High risk, high reward gameplay for skilled players.

name: Crystal Hourglass
effect: Rewinds time by 5 seconds, restoring health and position
details: A mystical device that bends time itself. Perfect for correcting mistakes or avoiding fatal damage. Cannot save you from instant death situations. Has an 8-room recharge.

name: Poison Vial
effect: Tears leave poisonous clouds that damage enemies over time
details: Your tears now release toxic gas upon impact. The poison effect stacks and is particularly effective against bosses. Enemies take damage for several seconds after being hit.

name: Iron Heart
effect: Grants 2 red heart containers
details: A simple but reliable item that increases your maximum health. Extra survivability is always valuable, especially for newer players or dangerous runs.

name: Magnetic Ring
effect: Increases pickup range and attracts coins from a distance
details: A ring imbued with magnetic properties. Makes collecting pickups much easier and can pull coins through gaps. Very useful for grabbing items in dangerous situations.

name: Celestial Orb
effect: Spawns an orbital that blocks enemy shots and deals contact damage
details: A glowing sphere that orbits around you. Excellent for defense as it blocks enemy projectiles and damages enemies on contact. Can save you from surprise attacks.

name: Chaos Dice
effect: Rerolls all items in the current room
details: A set of dice that can change your fate. Use it to reroll disappointing items or try for better options. Be careful - you might reroll something good into something worse! 6-room recharge.

name: Thunder Strike
effect: 15% chance for tears to create chain lightning on hit
details: Electrify your attacks with the power of storms. When activated, lightning jumps between nearby enemies, dealing damage to multiple targets. Extremely effective against grouped enemies.

name: Soul Jar
effect: Grants 2 soul hearts
details: A container for ethereal energy. Soul hearts provide extra protection without affecting devil deal chances. Always useful for extending your survival.

name: Flame Aura
effect: Surrounds you with a fiery aura that burns enemies on contact
details: Be wreathed in flames that damage any enemy foolish enough to get close. Great for clearing rooms with lots of melee enemies. Can also destroy obstacles.

name: Dimensional Key
effect: Creates a portal to a random special room
details: A key to other dimensions. Opens portals to treasure rooms, shops, secret rooms, or angel/devil rooms. High risk of getting stuck if used carelessly. 12-room recharge.

name: Sacred Tears
effect: Tears have a chance to create a holy light burst on impact
details: Blessed tears that occasionally explode in divine light. The burst damages all nearby enemies and can clear entire groups. Chance increases with luck.

name: Speed Boots
effect: Grants +0.3 speed
details: Simple but effective boots that make you faster. Speed is crucial for dodging attacks and navigating rooms quickly. Every bit helps!

name: Mirror Shield
effect: 10% chance to reflect enemy projectiles back at them
details: A polished shield that can turn enemy attacks against them. When it triggers, projectiles bounce back and damage your foes. Can turn bullet-hell situations into opportunities.

name: Cursed Skull
effect: Teleports you to a random room when hit, but increases item quality
details: A mysterious skull with a curse. Getting hit will teleport you away, which can be good or bad. In exchange, you find higher quality items. Risk and reward in balance.

name: Ancient Scroll
effect: Temporarily grants +3 damage for the current room
details: A scroll containing powerful incantations. Reading it provides a substantial damage boost for one room. Great for tough encounters or boss fights. 3-room recharge.
